Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

FileShare.description: An instance of a shared set of files with a common directory structure.
FileShare.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a shared set of files with a common directory structure.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

CASupported.description: Continuous Availability is supported. Client/Server mediated recovery from network and server failure with application transparency.
CASupported.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate that Continuous Availability is supported. Client/Server mediated recovery from network and server failure with application transparency. This property shall be NULL unless the FileSharingProtocols property includes SMB.  The default value for this property is false.

DefaultAccessCapabilities.description: An array of default access capabilities for the file share. The types of default access can include Read, Write, and/or Execute.
DefaultAccessCapabilities.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array containing entries for the default access capabilities for the file share. Each entry shall specify a defaul access privilege. The types of default access can include Read, Write, and/or Execute.

EthernetInterfaces.description: A link to the collection of Ethernet interfaces that provide access to this file share.
EthernetInterfaces.longDescription: The value shall be a link to an EthernetInterfaceCollection with members that provide access to the file share.

ExecuteSupport.description: Execute access is supported by the file share.
ExecuteSupport.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate whether Execute access is supported by the file share. The default value for this property is false.

FileSharePath.description: A path to an exported file or directory on the file system where this file share is hosted.
FileSharePath.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a path (relative to the file system root) to the exported file or directory on the file system where this file share is hosted.

FileShareQuotaType.description: Specifies the type of quota enforcement.
FileShareQuotaType.longDescription: If FileShareQuotaType is present, a value of Soft shall specify that quotas are not enforced, and a value of Hard shall specify that writes shall fail if the space consumed would exceed the value of the FileShareTotalQuotaBytes property.

FileShareRemainingQuotaBytes.description: The number of remaining bytes that may be used by this file share.
FileShareRemainingQuotaBytes.longDescription: If present, the value of this property shall indicate the remaining number of bytes that may be consumed by this file share.

FileShareTotalQuotaBytes.description: The maximum number of bytes that may be used by this file share.
FileShareTotalQuotaBytes.longDescription: If present, the value of this property shall indicate the maximum number of bytes that may be consumed by this file share.

FileSharingProtocols.description: An array of file sharing protocols supported by this file share.
FileSharingProtocols.longDescription: This property shall be an array containing entries for the file sharing protocols supported by this file share. Each entry shall specify a file sharing protocol supported by the file system.

Links.description: Contains links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This property shall contain links to other resources that are related to this resource.

LowSpaceWarningThresholdPercents.description: An array of low space warning threshold percentages for the file share.
LowSpaceWarningThresholdPercents.longDescription: This property shall be an array containing entries for the percentages of file share capacity at which low space warning events are be issued. A LOW_SPACE_THRESHOLD_WARNING event shall be triggered each time the remaining file share capacity value becomes less than one of the values in the array. The following shall be true: Across all CapacitySources entries, percent = (SUM(AllocatedBytes) - SUM(ConsumedBytes))/SUM(AllocatedBytes)

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

RemainingCapacityPercent.description: The percentage of the capacity remaining in the FileShare.
RemainingCapacityPercent.longDescription: If present, this value shall return  {[(SUM(AllocatedBytes) - SUM(ConsumedBytes)]/SUM(AllocatedBytes)}*100 represented as an integer value.

RootAccess.description: Root access is allowed by the file share.
RootAccess.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate whether Root access is allowed by the file share. The default value for this property is false.

Status.description: Indicates the status of the file share.
Status.longDescription: This value of this property shall indicate the status of the file share.

WritePolicy.description: Defines how writes are replicated to the shared source.
WritePolicy.longDescription: The value of this property shall define how writes are replicated to the shared source.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ClassOfService.description: A link to the ClassOfService for this file share.
ClassOfService.longDescription: This value shall be a link to the ClassOfService for this file share.

FileSystem.description: A link to the file system containing the file share.
FileSystem.longDescription: The value shall be a link to the file system containing the file share.

Oem.longDescription: This object represents the Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

OemActions.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

QuotaType.description: Indicates whether quotas are enabled and enforced by this file share. A value of Soft means that quotas are enabled but not enforced, and a value of Hard means that quotas are enabled and enforced.

enumDescriptions.Soft: Quotas are enabled but not enforced.

enumLongDescriptions.Hard: This value shall indicate that quotas are enabled and enforced.
enumLongDescriptions.Soft: This value shall indicate that quotas are enabled but not enforced.

QuotaType.longDescription: The value shall indicate whether quotas are enabled and enforced by this file share. If QuotaType is present, a value of Soft shall mean that quotas are enabled but not enforced, and a value of Hard shall mean that quotas are enabled and enforced.

title: #FileShare.v1_1_1.FileShare
